import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { MoviesLService } from '../services/movies-l.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-similar-movies', templateUrl: './similar-movies.component.html', styleUrls: ['./similar-movies.component.css'] }) export class SimilarMoviesComponent implements OnInit{ // similar movies data similarMovies:any; // movie id moveId:any; constructor(private active:ActivatedRoute, private movieList:MoviesLService){} ngOnInit(): void { // getting movie id from route this.active.params.subscribe((movieid)=>{ this.moveId=movieid['id'] }) // getting similar movie using id } }
